pages.title: Malachite Butterfly
pages.text: Siproeta stelenes ($(o)malachite$()) is a Neotropical brush-footed butterfly ($(o)family Nymphalidae).$(br2)The malachite has large wings that are black and brilliant green or yellow-green on the upperside and light brown and olive green on the underside.

pages.title: Malachite Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
